Html:
Aloha, 
      I want to ask how to set the maximum and minimum of the VerticalAxis in
 Dynamic Data Display.
     For example, I have a group of data that arranged in order from little to big, and the difference between them is big. If not fixed,  the little number input first would be too big when come into screen and when the sequent big number come, the little number would become little. 
   So the range of ordinate is changing in the drawing, I want to ask if it can be fixed.
   Thanks.

Did you manage to solve this? I am having the same problem - the autofitenabled only seems to work if the new data I load is outside the current range on the y-axis. Otherwise it doesn't re-scale the y-axis. any help much appreciated - thanks!

Edward
